wine_label:marginalia: "Dinner. Jean Casenove. Paris. 5/17/50 B. with Truite au Bleau. Present: L.J., Priscilla, Fred, Ada, Charlie Gibson, ELC, CEH"
wine_label:questions: The 5/17/50 dinner was listed twice. Is this because 2 different bottles of wine were consumed on the same occasion? (Also, in one dinner trout was served; in the other, kidneys)
